last_episode_to_air.name: What Lycidias Beneath
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mavis attempts to perform the Vamp Stamp, a move made infamous by her ancestor, Lycidias Dracula, that emits powerful shockwaves that can knock back any monster and human attack. But when Mavis disturbs his lost crypt, she unleashes an underworld of trouble. Dracula returns to help his sister and brother try to stop their ancestor from dominating the monster world again and release Mavis from his control. Mavis ultimately manages to overcome him by doing the powerful Vamp Stamp move. The spirit of Lycidias is trapped within Klaus' smoothie cup and locked in the basement. Dracula then makes the decision to remain at the Hotel in case other ancient threats emerge in order to keep his daughter safe. Wendy accidentally breaks the glass lantern and Lycidias' dark essence is released with the intent of causing great harm to both the Underworld and the monster world.

name: Hotel Transylvania: The Series
overview: Mavis navigates life without her dad, Dracula, around and discovers one of the few common human and monster truths: being a teenager bites.

episodes.name: Enter the Nose Picker
episodes.overview: Mavis accidentally lures an unwelcome guest into the hotel.

episodes.name: Hide & Shriek
episodes.overview: Mavis finds her childhood toy, Demented Debbie, in the attic.

episodes.name: Bad Friday
episodes.overview: The monsters celebrate Bad Friday by trying to win the Screamie for the best scare.

episodes.name: Hoop Screams
episodes.overview: Mavis gives Hank the gift of basketball.

episodes.name: Buggin' Out
episodes.overview: While doing her chores around the hotel, Mavis mistakes truth bugs for bed bugs.

episodes.name: How Do You Solve a Problem Like Medusa
episodes.overview: Mavis invites Lydia's high school rival to the hotel.

episodes.name: Adventures in Vampiresitting
episodes.overview: The kids get trapped in a human house.

episodes.name: Phlegm Ball
episodes.overview: Mavis' cousin shows up and challenges her to a game of phlegm ball.

episodes.name: Wendy Big and Tall
episodes.overview: Mavis accidentally turns Wendy into a ginormous, blobby version of her little self.

episodes.name: Doppelfanger
episodes.overview: Mavis' teen crush, Jett Black, visits the hotel.

episodes.name: Great Eggspectations
episodes.overview: Mavis tries to prove she can care for a living creature by rescuing a "bad egg".

episodes.name: Hotel Pennsylvania
episodes.overview: The kids try to watch the last episode of their favorite show, Hotel Pennsylvania.

episodes.name: Breakfast at Lydia's
episodes.overview: Mavis wins employee of the month and the right to share breakfast with Aunt Lydia.

episodes.name: The Trouble with Wendys
episodes.overview: Dr. Gillman saves Wendy's ponytail and now she's indebted to him.

episodes.name: Frankenstunt
episodes.overview: Hank has to pretend to be his dad as he films his new action flick.

episodes.name: What About Blob?
episodes.overview: Mavis and Wendy set up Aunt Lydia and Bob Blob on a date.

episodes.name: Curse Club
episodes.overview: Pedro desperately tries to throw a curse.

episodes.name: Casket if You Can
episodes.overview: Mavis loses a casket with Aunt Lydia resting inside.

episodes.name: A Scare to Remember
episodes.overview: Aunt Lydia's favorite author is coming to the hotel, but the kids cleaned the room so fast they accidentally got rid of the real ghost writer.

episodes.name: Hank and the Real Boy
episodes.overview: The kids clean a room so fast they accidentally get rid of a ghost writer.

episodes.name: The Wrapture
episodes.overview: Mavis accidentally destroys Pedro's mummy wraps.

episodes.name: Becoming Klaus
episodes.overview: Mavis is driven mad thinking she's morphing into her cousin Klaus.

episodes.name: 116 Candles
episodes.overview: Aunt Lydia is accidentally turned into a teen.

episodes.name: Stop or My Mummy Will Shout
episodes.overview: Pedro's mom visits the hotel.

episodes.name: The Legend of Pumpkin Guts
episodes.overview: Mavis learns the true meaning of Halloween.

episodes.name: Fright of Hand
episodes.overview: Mavis hosts a birthday party for Diane.

episodes.name: Dude Where's My Garlic?
episodes.overview: The hotel becomes infested with garlic.

episodes.name: Bat Flap Fever
episodes.overview: Dracula receives an endorsement deal.

episodes.name: Thumb and Thumber
episodes.overview: Hank learns his thumb is from a famous ancestor.

episodes.name: Brain Drain
episodes.overview: Hank swaps brains with Sir Isaac Newton, a zombie.

episodes.name: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
episodes.overview: Medusa visits the hotel.

episodes.name: Drop the Needle
episodes.overview: The needle on Lydia's record player is broken, and Klaus claims to know where on is if Mavis teaches him to bat out.

episodes.name: Really Gross Anatomy
episodes.overview: Dr. Gilman has to take a test to prove he's a real doctor.

episodes.name: The Fright Before Creepmas
episodes.overview: Mavis wants Krampus to resolve a past mistake so everyone can enjoy Creepmas.

episodes.name: Exit Sandman
episodes.overview: The Sandman puts the hotel under a spell.

episodes.name: Roadkill Trip
episodes.overview: Mavis and Uncle Gene go on one last road trip.

episodes.name: Top Wing
episodes.overview: Mavis tries to make Quasimodo be nice.

episodes.name: Fried Mean Tomatoes
episodes.overview: Wendy applies for a spot on the hotel's aerial security team.

episodes.name: Four Monsters and a Funeral
episodes.overview: Mavis talks herself into throwing a fake funeral for Uncle Gene.

episodes.name: Rainbow Doom
episodes.overview: Mavis uses a cursed code to accidentally unleash a video game on the hotel.

episodes.name: Drac to the Future
episodes.overview: Kitty gets sucked into the self-updating book on the history of monsters, which is on display at the hotel; Mavis must travel back in time to find her.

episodes.name: Gorytelling
episodes.overview: Cornelius Shivers is writing a book about Hotel Transylvania.

episodes.name: A Few Good Monsters
episodes.overview: When a priceless Dracula family heirloom is destroyed, the four kids are the prime suspects.

episodes.name: Mummyfest Destiny
episodes.overview: Pedro uses an amulet to be first in line at the buffet.

episodes.name: Bandages of Brothers
episodes.overview: Pedro and Hank have not been getting along. Mavis and Wendy suggest they should get new roommates.

episodes.name: Creepover Party
episodes.overview: Mavis' werewolf pals from her old Ghoul Guide troop come to the hotel for a visit.

episodes.name: Frankstein & Son
episodes.overview: Frankenstein is casting for his new movie at Hotel Transylvania.

episodes.name: Fangceañera
episodes.overview: It's Mavis' Fangceanera and she's turning 115. Not only is it a party, but a vampire rite of passage as she finally earns her Dracula cape.

episodes.name: Welcome to Human Park
episodes.overview: On the night before Halloween, Mavis and the gang want to be scared silly

episodes.name: Must Scream TV
episodes.overview: When Pedro works some candy magic on the TV remote, Mavis goes poof and winds up inside the TV.

episodes.name: Married to the Blob
episodes.overview: When Wendy's Dad and Pedro's Mom plan to get married, Mavis promises Hotel Transylvania will throw them the best wedding ever.

episodes.name: Portrait of Mavis as a Young Vampire
episodes.overview: Mavis is so excited that she is finally getting her portrait hung in the Hall of Draculas.

episodes.name: Goo Crush
episodes.overview: Wendy has never had a crush, so Mavis sets out to help her find one.

episodes.name: Freakerheads
episodes.overview: Hank is obsessed with the latest fad, Freakerheads.

episodes.name: For Whom the Smell Tolls
episodes.overview: Mavis has got the Vapors, a next level event in the afterlife of a vampire.

episodes.name: Cries and Dolls
episodes.overview: Mavis' dreams are haunted by a familiar foe.

episodes.name: Hypnosferatu
episodes.overview: Mavis attempts to master the art of vampnosis.

episodes.name: Best Friends Furever
episodes.overview: Mavis promises to have a spa day with Wendy and have lunch with the werewolf twins at the same time.

episodes.name: Fantasy Vamp
episodes.overview: Mavis wins two tickets to the phlegm ball fantasy camp.

episodes.name: Stepmonsters
episodes.overview: Mavis convinces Pedro and Wendy to get to know their new stepparents.

episodes.name: Better Know Your Mavis
episodes.overview: Mavis' friends take care of her when she is sick.

episodes.name: The Northern Frights
episodes.overview: Uncle Gene is invited to a performance of the Northern Frights

episodes.name: Don't Fear the Realtor
episodes.overview: Maggie the ghostwriter returns and wants to sell Hotel Transylvania.

episodes.name: Holy Babies
episodes.overview: Mavis fibs that it is her birthday to get an ice scream bar.

episodes.name: Aunt Lydia's New Clothes
episodes.overview: After 500 years, Aunt Lydia's invisibility poncho arrives.

episodes.name: I Only Have Eyes for Goo
episodes.overview: Thanks to a cursed prescription, Wendy's new glasses allow her to read minds.

episodes.name: Talk Blobbish to Me
episodes.overview: Pedro accidentally curses the whole hotel to speak Blobbish and nothing else.

episodes.name: Wand Ambition
episodes.overview: Mavis' lost magic wand falls into the wrong hands and Hotel Transylvania gets trapped inside a snow globe.

episodes.name: Lost in Transylvation
episodes.overview: Mavis finally gets a word in the Vamptionary.

episodes.name: The Song Remains Asleep
episodes.overview: Aunt Lydia wants to replace the hotel's elevator music.

episodes.name: Baby Got Hunchback
episodes.overview: Mavis and the gang uncover Quasimodo's secret recipe for dirt flambé.

episodes.name: Afterlifestyles of the Rich and Mavis
episodes.overview: Mavis arranges a special celebration for Frankenstein and Eunice's anniver-scary.

episodes.name: The Mavysitters Club
episodes.overview: The wolf pups are out of control and Aunt Lydia puts Klaus in charge of caring for them.

episodes.name: A Year Without Creepmas
episodes.overview: When Mavis confronts Krampus over slacking on the job and inadvertently gets him to take a vacation, she must team up with a strange bearded guy named Santa to save Creepmas

episodes.name: Casualties of Wart
episodes.overview: Mavis wakes up with a giant pimple on her face.

episodes.name: When the Afterlife Gives You Phlegmonade
episodes.overview: Werewolf twins Sophie and Charlotte can't stop arguing, so Mavis steps in with a solution.

episodes.name: Undead Red
episodes.overview: The kids summon the centuries old beast, Undead Red.

episodes.name: Klaus of the Rising Sun
episodes.overview: Klaus inadvertently saves Mavis from stepping into a beam of sunlight.

episodes.name: Say Princess to the Dress
episodes.overview: Mavis is transformed into a fairy-tale princess when she sniffs a princess orchid.

episodes.name: The Naming of the Shrew
episodes.overview: When playing a game of jinx, Mavis accidentally jinxes Aunt Lydia.

episodes.name: Death Becomes Him
episodes.overview: Pedro gets stuck with Death's job when he steals his robe. Death is only too happy to pawn the job off to him.

episodes.name: Purse of the Mummy
episodes.overview: Shonda buys a magic purse for Wendy's birthday, but Mavis loses control of it.

episodes.name: Cape Boss
episodes.overview: Mavis could lose her precious cape if she can't show she has it well trained.

episodes.name: Diner of the Dead
episodes.overview: Pedro greatly boosts the zombie staff's energy when he feeds them the Cartwrights' porridge, causing a zombie apocalypse.

episodes.name: Six Feet Undercover Boss
episodes.overview: The hotel's new janitor just might be Aunt Lydia in disguise spying on her employees.

episodes.name: Ghost Effect
episodes.overview: Mavis sets up an elaborate safety system to prevent workplace accidents at the hotel.

episodes.name: World Wide Wendy
episodes.overview: Mavis learns the best way to bring the Hotel into the future is to go wireless.

episodes.name: Stuck in the Middle With Goo
episodes.overview: The step-siblings Pedro and Wendy need a tiebreaker.

episodes.name: The Shawhank Redemption
episodes.overview: Mavis and the gang help Hank overcome his fears with a little scare-apy

episodes.name: Friendship is Tragic
episodes.overview: Mavis is excited to have a day all to herself which upsets her best friends, thinking they are drifting apart.

episodes.name: Cursery Rhymes
episodes.overview: Mavis is excited to have a day all to herself which upsets her best friends, thinking they are drifting apart.

episodes.name: I Did It All for the Cookie
episodes.overview: Quasimodo's jar of misfortune cookies gets raided by Aunt Lydia when she tells Mavis of a misfortune fortelling her downfall as a child.

episodes.name: Fangs for the Memories
episodes.overview: Mavis accidentally erases Jett Black's memories.

episodes.name: Sleepers Creepers
episodes.overview: All vampires must hibernate for twenty-four hours when the Chubacabra is on its way to the Hotel.

episodes.name: Polterguest
episodes.overview: Mavis rents out the Catwrights' house to spirits.

episodes.name: Hair Raiser
episodes.overview: Mavis tries to give herself a haircut that ends in disaster all over the Hotel after getting a cowlick.
